divs: Sighting DetailsMY FRIEND,MY NEPHEW AND I WERE GOING TO SLEEP ON THE DECK ONE NIGHT BECAUSE ITWAS REALLY CLEAR. WE WERE LOOKING AT THE STARS FOR A WHILE AND I SAW SOMETHINGCOMING FROM THE SW AND IT WENT OVER US PRETTY HIGH IN THE AIR. IT SEEMED LIKE ANEGG THAT WAS SHINY LIKE STAINLESS STEEL. IT CAME BACK OVER US GOING EAST ANDONCE AGAIN GOING NE. IT MADE NO SOUND YOU COULD SEE IT WASNT AN AIRPLANE,IT WASVERY EASY TO MAKEOUT THE SHAPE AGAINST THE BLACK SKY. THIS HAPPEND IN ABOUT 3-4MIN. THERE WAS NO WAY TO TELL EXACTLY HOW FAST THE EGG WAS TRAVELING BUT ITSEEMED ALOT FASTER THAN PLANES. IT WOULD COMPLETELY DISAPPEAR, NOT OVER THEHORIZON BUT IN THE SKY.IN AFEW SECONDS IT WOULD REAPPEAR HEADING IN A NEWDIRECTION
trends: There have been no other sightings in BAKEWELL
This sighting has never been favorited.
